definition: generic word for peoples or states of south China or south Asia at different historical periods/abbr. for Vietnam 越南
to exceed/to climb over/to surpass/the more... the more
common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party

sentences.english: These carbines were in turn given to the Viet Cong.
sentences.chinese: 这些卡宾枪再被提供给南边的越共游击队。

sentences.english: The enemy Vietcong made each person count.
sentences.chinese: 敌军越共却能人人各有其值。

sentences.english: and we listened while America blamed it all on the Viet Cong.
sentences.chinese: 我们听到的却是美国将这一切都归咎于越共。

sentences.english: By 1958, Communist-led guerrillas known as the Viet Cong had begun to battle the South Vietnamese government.
sentences.chinese: 1958年，越共游击队即越共开始与南越政府开战。

sentences.english: By 1958, Communist-led guerrillas known as the Viet Cong had begun to battle the South Vietnamese government.
sentences.chinese: 1958年，越共游击队即越共开始与南越政府开战。

sentences.english: One reason for this is because the Viet Cong were using guerrilla tactics.
sentences.chinese: 原因之一是因为越共使用游击战术。

sentences.english: He also spoke of opening Vietnam's political process to candidates from outside the Communist Party.
sentences.chinese: 他表示，越南政治进程应向非越共候选人敞开大门。

sentences.english: You play as an American patrol which has to go into Vietnamese villages looking for Vietcong sympathisers.
sentences.chinese: 你扮演美军巡逻队，要深入丛林里寻找越共通敌者。

definition: Democratic Republic of Vietnam (aka North Vietnam), a country in Southeast Asia 1945-1976
pinyin: Yue4 nan2 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2

definition: Syngman Rhee (1875-1965), US trained Korean politician and dictator, president of Republic of Korea 1948-1960
